articles.title: Stock futures fall overnight after Nasdaq registers worst day since October: Live updates - CNBC
articles.description: The tech-heavy index slid to begin the new year on Tuesday.
articles.content:
Stock futures are little changed Wednesday after the Nasdaq Composite on Tuesday registered its worst session since October.
